idea: Games Pandit grows best gaming innovation and smooth gaming interface with inventive methodology and offers a stage for online players to win energizing prizes, rewards, and guaranteed gifts. idea:
Nature Bricks - Your Eco Partner.

Our name summarizes our mission and philosophy – We strive to attract people’s attention to the environment and aim to transform change by beginning now, all this in an eco-friendly way!

The objective of naturebricks.com is to provide you with sustainable, natural and eco-friendly solutions for your daily needs and thereby promoting environmental awareness in society.

We specialize in corporate gifting solutions of eco-friendly, organic, natural and sustainable products at affordable rates.

For more details and new product info visit us at :

· Website - naturebricks.com

· Mail - info@naturebricks.com

· Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/naturebricks.official/

· Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/naturebricks.official/

· Twitter - https://twitter.com/naturebricks

· Pinterest - https://in.pinterest.com/naturebricks
name: naturebricks.com

idea: ACE DIGIHEALTHCARE OPC PVT LTD  owns and runs an application named Toothbudy which gives free dental checkups and x ray to  customers . Early detecting of oral cancer through regular dental checkup can  save life of people. we are establishing a network of 500+ dental clinics where customers can do cashless dental treatment. customers just have to buy our dental packages and they can avail benefit of all dental treatments cashless. our main aim is  to make quality dental treatment available to all at minimum cost  thus improving oral hygiene of everyone. We have customized dental packages for everyone. We also provide Snap on veneers to customers trough our website portal www.snapsmile.in. These veneers/crowns are removable  option to customers who have missing teeth, customers who  wishes to have pearly white teeth and people who wish to have a complete smile makeover whiteout affecting their natural teeth. SnapSmile veneers is completely painless ,non harmful and can be done at home comfort very quickly.
name: ACE DIGIHEALTHCARE (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
